column4: i have a powershot sx100 is canon camera. plugging it through the usb cable works, the photos even show on my computer, as i try to open one of them no program is able to. cant transfer them onto my computer. do i need to download a driver? how can i knonw if ubuntu (latest version) supports this model?
are you shooting in Raw?
what is Raw?
its on the camera if the images are stored in RAW format you need to find support for the file
oddly enough so do mine on my Canon T4i but I shoot in RAW so I end up having to use my mac with lightroom and an extension

this is bizarre. i just tried to open a photo to give you the error number and now they all open and i can switch images no problem. haha. its weird. how come??? how come it works now? and how can i count on it working the ext time

it doesnt give me an error number, it only says somethig like this: "No images found in 'gphoto2://[usb:001,025]/DCIM/100CANON/IMG_0017.JPG'.", and this is while the picture is displayed as a thumbnail
Does your computer have a card reader?
no.
can you import all the files using gPhoto ? check your cables it sounds like a lose connection between the camera and computer
ok, ive tried two different cables.
how old is the camera
im not sure. its a friends. im guessing around 2 years
you may just have to take it file by file.  If this is something you will be doing often you may want to run to walmart or like store and buy a memory card reader for like $15
ctrl+N for a new window
yes this opens up the home folder
now make a temp folder and drag and drop the files
ok
L3mce ok this works. now this is my problem: it takes a couple of minutes for all the files to load and only then will it even let me drag and drop. why may this be?
Camera maybe older then you thought or the computer is and is using usb 1.0
what is usb 1.0? my computer is from 2005
You can look into turning of thumbnail mode though not sure how myself

thats i guess in "view", but is it possible that all this trouble is only because of my kind of "old" hardware and that it just takes a bit time because the connection isnt ideal? i mean, after a couple of minutes all the files display and when i drag 'n drop, it works fine
